item.title: Cracking Nebula Part 2
item.description: On Exploit Exercises you can find a number of CTF (Capture The Flag) VM images where you can practice your exploiting, hacking and general computer savviness. I’ve been working my way through the Nebula machine and figured I might as well write up the process both for other’s benefit if they get stuck, and also as a sort of diary for myself, so I can refer back to any info if I need to.

item.title: Cracking Nebula Part 1
